mapper.select: select hno as "hno", change_date as "changeDate", mid as "mid", sh.rno as "rno", next_status as "nextStatus", reply as "reply", dist_source as "distSource" from status_histories sh, status s, requests r where sh.next_status = s.status_no and r.rno = sh.rno and s.status_name = '개발완료' and sh.rno = #{rno} order by change_date desc
